error_description: Public POST /users endpoint lacks rate limiting: enables username enumeration and brute force attacks (security fault: missing throttling on registration)
Inconsistent Optional handling in update: uses orElseThrow unlike getById's .get() pattern (code smell/maintainability fault: inconsistent error handling)
LazyInitializationException risk in enforceAddressOwnership: address.getUser() with FetchType.LAZY may fail outside transaction if user not preloaded (interaction fault: JPA fetch strategy mismatch)
